text: The phrase 'it 'll run fine anyway' is such a weak mindset. You are ok with what happened, losing, imperfection of a craft. When you stop getting angry after dropping below 200 fps, you’ve lost twice. There’s always something to learn, and always room for improvement, never settle.
author: NuaLaoch
